name: Super Lynx Rush
description:
Super Lynx Rush is a traditional 2D platform game. You need kill or avoid the enemies. Find coins and hidden objects. And the most important thing: Collect clocks to stay alive.

This game is currently not a finished game and may or may not change significantly over the course of development.

Change Log

Version 0.02 (2015-10-11)

  • The tutorial only run once.

Mac OS X Users

A known issue with the Mac version, is an error displaying that the app is damaged and can't be opened/should be moved to the trash. If this happens with you, go to System Preferences > Security & Privacy and under Allow applications downloaded from, select Anywhere. After doing this should work.


Don't forget to send us your feedback to @PixelBestiary
